title: Because Riot never replies to 'Help and Support' section of the forum

embed.description: So following constant disconnection and being unable to connect to the game, I was placed in low priority queue or whatever the name is - My connection was fine, but still couldn't connect to the game.

replies.body:
Most of the time its your problem, you just don't want to admit it. I've d/c'ed once. only once and that was during the natural disaster around Newcastle and Sydney.

I'm willing to bet you share your connection, and that is why you lag. 

there is nothing wrong with the server, we have one of the most stable servers in the riot network.

do you have proof you got the skin in the first place?

if not then you wont be getting it
